Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. We're confident it could bring immense benefits to you as well. Considering its unique features and unparalleled performance, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $10000. This is an opportunity to acquire a top-tier solution that surpasses expectations. We look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
